channel.title: Need players for Remnent Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Need players for Remnent Village" - New memberes

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Remnant is no more. I took the diffcult desion to shut down the village due to a hoard of lazy ninja….. This Remnant is very sad to have to do so, but for reasons of the lazy ninja, no one really putting the money in for upgrade and having become a slave to reaper missions to pay for the few we got, it was for the best……..

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: I really need helf here Griffica! The Village hidden in Geostigma is falling apart due to host of lazy go for nothing people who call themself ninja!!!!!!!!! What do you think I should do? Sell it or destroy it?

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Tghings are getting annoying here in Remnant Griffica. nearly half the village is lazy and I seem to be the only one really pouring cash in…..

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Hey everyone. Remnant is really starting to grow now and should be in the war soon.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: still waiting…….

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: OK.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: sorry i was gone. my bad. ALso i have one bucket and 3 alts. I cant give you one. About members i can try to get some. the rush from facebook is great. It ill leave my options open. ill try and get some for you soon ok?1-3 days.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Remnant now has the first 4 upgrades : Hitaiate Maker, Party House, Banker and Collection Squad. Untill we get 4 more members, we cant contiune to grow. We REALLY need members Giffica and could you pass a billy bucket to VegaUchiha please? Its hard to hit Billy lv 3.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Now need 2 members as I have removed loonymich from Remnant, not enjoyed. Please AoB, I REALLY need members here. If I had another IP, I would make a third player to join my own village. You said you would help me out Giffica!

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Need 1 more member then I start getting roaming Genin coming in.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Oh and Zeekee do you have another alt? could you send one to The Hyuga?

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Yeh could you send it to The Hyuga? Please? Ill repay you back tomarow. my ninja are very obedient and always do exatly wht i say. i told them to donate, everyone donated they ryo for the day. told then to give items they all gave atleast 5. so ill have them make alts.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded:
I just started a new char and I would be happy to join your village should you want me ^^

Tara is the name and Im active and fun to hang around =)

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: loonymich SHOULD start collecting soon as she forgot the web address scince we last met last Friday. Resources are coming in daily now, just 1 a day, but I am starting to upgrade now. Got Headband and Party House. Still in seroius need of members.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: You want a 3rd player from me!?!? I already made VegaShinra just yesterday.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Um can you make naotehr and send it too Psychic? They need alotof help and they are in our alliance. ALso give the cred to me giffica, k? Thank since you cant give it to you cause of ip's. Also i love FF too. Crisis Core was the best game ever!

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: First couple of days i didnt find resources, but they are coming now. I got the headband upgrade and when I get 1 more, the party house. And the second player which I will send to you (made just now! ;)) is called VegaShinra (I love Final Fantasy)

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Your not upgrading yet? Do you have any villagers? Also could you send a alt to nendo? Ill send what i can. im going to send my scout to check out the village in 2 days. i will have to have him leave but not after i replace it with another villager. the name is tsunade or britzer.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Just send them when you can. Resources are in short supply for me and I putting my daily cash into the village. By the time start upgrading, I will have a HELL load of cash.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: LOL that sounded wrong. Haha. ALso i am not sure i can yet. Since Iota says he can handle nendo and make it great in a week i dont need to send anyone to nendo. The Hyuga should have enough so far so i will send any extra's i got to you.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Mybe the AoB would be so kind as to send me some players as the solo villager i have loonymich has yet to collect for my village. I know her so when i see her i need to push her a litte.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: I noticed.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Just so u know, I made a spelling mistake on the Village Name - Its spelt Remnant with a A not E.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Still need new members. Know anyone who needs to relocate or a place for IP players.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: The wiki.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Yeah its Ok. you mean the wiki page for the forum or something else?

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Basically just go to the forum. Everything will be explained there. Also i will now put you on the list this is ok correct?

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Cool. So do I need to do anything as a member of the Angels of Blood?

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Need any help im there for you. I just made The Uchiha about 2 weeks ago. We are doing very well with 35 villagers. Look us up. I havent updated the page since im currently out but i will tommarow. Also thank you for joining. you saw the link to our forum correct? Go there sign up ill give you access to the aob part. I am also a member oh rasta and jedi are allies with them. They may not be still but they were in Axis together correct?

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: The Angels Of Blood…. Looks cool, I saw it from another page. Ok,The Vilage Hidden in GeoStigma would be glad to join your alliance. I am VegaUchiha, leader and former member of Jedi Village. I had always wanted my own village and just set up today. Hopefully I can start getting upgrades tommrow.

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Can you expain this to me?

item.title: Re: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: Yo you wanna join AoB alliance. I can send a emissary to your village? ou also wouldnt need to do the same. I am fine with mine current villager count.

item.title: Need players for Remnent Village
item.content:encoded: I am VegaUchiha, the Amarikage or Remnent Shadow of the Village Hidden in GeoStigma (yes I like Final Fantasy, so dont start). I am in need of members to help my new village grow. All comers welcome, new players, rouges Remnents from other villages. Like the Silver Haired Men, we are all family!
